message: RT @rbanks54: Amusing response to a request to remove #regions on the #visualstudio uervoice site: http://t.co/wZU5eOmysZ #wellPlayed
name: #region Directive Considered Harmful (was "Get rid of #region")
caption: visualstudio.uservoice.com
description: My informal analysis concludes that #regions are used for evil 96% of the time.

data.message: #region is not harmful, but mostly it's a warning sign that something bad is happening. Either a very large class (Monster Object Anti-pattern) or a large method which needs to be divided into smaller methods.
